description: This file sets up a Wikipedia-based knowledge base and an agent that interacts with it, including loading data and querying about football teams.

classes.name: WikipediaKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a Wikipedia-based knowledge repository.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class for vector database integration using PostgreSQL and pgvector.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query.
